attributes.action: Make construction workers become key workers for Q Jump
attributes.additional_details: To make it eligible for us to benefit from being made priority for purchasing essentials during the pandemic and lockdown as I and the rest of construction workers are not able to gain access to supermarkets at reasonable times as we are critical workers getting up early and going home late
attributes.background: To enable all construction workers to use there cscs cards for q jump at supermarkets as we are critical and key workers for the economy holding up the country during this pandemic we are putting our lives at risk in the workplace

rejection.details: The Q-Jump system is a private app for which the UK Government and House of Commons are not responsible. If you want businesses to give construction workers priority you should request this to them directly.
